# GitHub Copilot Instructions

- create functional components using React and TypeScript.
- do not use arrow functions for defining components, use function declarations instead.
- Use Shadcn UI components for building the user interface wherever possible.
- For icons, use the "lucide-react" library.
- Ensure all links within the application use the "react-router" Link component for navigation.
- Maintain consistent styling and theming as per the existing design system.
- use react-hook-form and zod for form handling and validation.
- use shadcn field components for building forms.
- use Zustand for state management.
- use Tailwind CSS for styling and layout.
- use Recharts and shadcn chart components for data visualization and charts.

- When creating new components, follow the existing project structure and naming conventions.
- use dynamic mapping for rendering repeated elements instead of hardcoding them.
- use cn utility for conditional classNames.
- create colorMap objects for status indications instead of hardcoding colors in UI.
